chunk_text: • Gathering room for your bridal party to rest and refresh while preparing for your special day. This room has a marble wet bar, soft seating and room to relax and enjoy a snack and a glass of wine. • The secondary suite is equipped with a full bathroom, air conditioning, soft seating, full sized mirror, and plenty of hanging space for your special wardrobe. • Capacity for all three rooms is 30 people including vendors. • This room is to be locked during the ceremony and reception.
